attributes.action: Ensure all Ukrainians escaping the war can enter and find asylum in the UK
attributes.additional_details: It is shameful and unacceptable that women and children fleeing conflict cannot find sanctuary in the UK
attributes.background: Pass emergency legislation enabling all refugees from the war in Ukraine to reside in the UK for 3 years

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open on this topic which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
